summary: Syntax file for GetDP Numerical Environment
name: getdp
description: GetDP is a Numerical Environment for partial diferential equations, mainly through the Finite Element method. This simple script helps vim users in daily work providing color and syntax support.
install_details: The GetDP community uses .pro files to store their problems, so adding this lines in filetype.vim will help" GetDP (Scientific Environment)augroup filetypedetectau BufNewFile,BufRead *.pro     setf getdpaugroup END
